reviewText: I am so so so so so excited for the release of this!! One Direction is my favourite artist and I loveee them(:
Torn. Zayn is an ASS!
Shipped fast and very pleased with product.
Love one direction, had to add this to our collection.
My 13 year old is loving this!!!!!!
Same pretty good the kids loved it
as described and quick shipping
I LOVE this! Best surprise for me was that this Blu-Ray has one more song on it than the regular DVD version!

great for the 1D fanatic.  I love this movie.  Loved the backstage footage of all of them.  They're so quirky!  That's part of their charm!  Great color, great sound.  Whoever doesn't like this video isn't a true 1D fan.  I am however and I will keep it with my collection of schtuffs from them.  I love Louis and Harry in this...they're so great.
Just not as good as This Is Us
Great just as expected!! Thank you

A fun music video/documentary that my granddaughter and I have enjoyed watching together quite a few times. One Direction's early songs are fun and light-hearted and the tone of their stories and their personalities are very upbeat.  Definitely have lots of appeal across generations. (We love their recent stuff too!) Sound quality and production values are first rate.
Loves it
It was a gift
Great concert!!! Voices are awesome! Listen to it over and over again.  Love it.
My daughter loves it!

Excellent Blu-ray!!l loved each one of their songs and the quality of this dvd it's excellent.
l waited to have this for long time and l'm really happy finally l could! Thank you very much Amazon.
Was sad what happened with shipment, but Amazon solved the problem very well. Will buy again!
my friends daughter loved it
Loved it
My niece love it!

The kids love this DVD.  My daughter opened this at her birthday party and EVERYONE screamed.  Seriously, it was hilarious.  She's watched it about 100 times.
Because One Direction.
Nice product
Came with water damage to the case.
AMAZING
LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!!!
I love One Direction's talent and this DVD was great.
My daughters was thrilled that she got a motive of one diection! And it came before Christmas which was great!
Now I have ordered all of the 1D movies, and they are all amazing, and they have all left me with tears. The three movies they have now are all must-haves!
quick delivery, product as described
Love it!
If you like them, you want this.
Awesome
MY ONE DIRECTION FAN LOVED IT!
Awesome
Mine came in great condition I can still watch it without it freezing
My teenager like the CD by live was not the same as recorded without the background, etc. Wish I had chosen the top hits instead.
This was a gift for my daughter and she loves 1D!
Granddaughter Loved It!
Love it
excelente
good stugg
We love One Direction. This movie is on earlier tours and it is great.

I only recently discovered 1D so this is old news but it's still fun to watch with my daughters. I am an older fan in my 30s but once a boy band lover always a boy band lover. Looking forward to many more DVDs to come from these talented guys!
My granddaughter loved it
Catchy songs, fun antics.  If you are a One Direction fan, there should not be any reason you won't enjoy it!
This was a gift for one of my many daughters who love these guys.  I've never listened to their songs.

This was pretty expensive ( when I purchased it it was like 20 dollars, I believe) for what it is, which is basically just a glorified video of a concert, but I mean for a One Direction fan it's pretty fun to watch. I guess I wouldn't buy it again if I went back in time, but I'm not really upset about the purchase, if that makes any sense. I liked watching it, especially with a group of friends, but it was quite expensive at the time. If you quite like One Direction you should get it, especially if you haven't gone to a concert.

this is a great concert, especially on Blu Ray.  The picture quality could have been better, but it was recorded live in a small town in England.  If they had performed in Las Vegas in one of the great Casino theaters like Caesar's Palace, the picture would have been a lot better.  Still a great concert.
Coming from a heavy metal lover, I think they sound really good! Love to watch them sing! Have several itemsof them

The quality is high, the music and soundtrack are perfect!  Its like living with the boys during their tour.  They are very personable and real and fun - makes you want to be 18 again!  Their singing is spot on and even though I hate the tatoos on them, they come across as very down to Earth young men and you like each and everyone of them!  I hope they stay away from the vices many before them have fallen to - they don't need it!  The extended cut is worth it!

We watched it and went over fairly well for "all ages". 11-year-old was captivated and the rest of us enjoyed the show. Includes main track with live performance, plus extras: three music videos and one story of sorts about going on the tour.
I bought it for my five year old grand-daughter who is a big fan of One D and she loved it.

my daughter is a 1D fan--so this was the perfect gift for her.
it highlights their music and shows them "off stage"
highly recommend for your 1D fan.....
My 16 year old daughter LOVED it! She couldn't make the concert... next best thing she said. I'm glad I purchased.
1D is a wonderful group for the tween-teen-twenties range, but I've enjoyed listening too at 67.  This is a group that I don't mind the granddaughter listening to.
My niece luvz ONE DIRECTION & this was one of her xmas gifts...... she was so happy... HOPEFULLY I'LL HAVE A CHANCE TO SIT DOWN ND WATCH IT WITH HER  ;-0
Got this to go with their other DVD for my granddaughter at Christmas and she has watched it over and over again.  A big hit.
I bought this DVD for my granddaughter for Christmas.  She loves it, watches it all the time. One Direction does not disappoint.
My granddaughter is a HUGE 1 Direction fan.  She seemed very happy with this Christmas morning.  I have not heard it, but if she's pleased, I'm happy

If you have a One Direction fan in your family, they will absolutely want to make sure they have a copy of this. My daughter collects all their authorized cd's and dvd's (not all of the unauthorized ones). This one is a must-have.
My granddaughter got this as a Christmas gift. She absolutely loves it. She is their number one 8 year old fan.
Granddaughter squealed with joy when she opened it!  She is having a great time dancing to the music--grandma did a good job with this gift!

My daughter is a huge 1D fan and she saw this in the movies. I watched it with her again at home in our home theater and the sound quality was amazing.  I especially liked how they wove a story into the film, allowing us to see who each person was and how they lived  while on the road. Very Beatles reminiscent.
This is absolutely perfect and made me cry.  I love the boys and this is the best thing ever. AMAZING
My daughter screamed and actually shed tears watching this video.  It reminded me of teenage girls watching The Beatles.  :)
My daughter loves One Direction.  It is exactly what we were looking for.  We could not find it in the local stores!! Thank you!!
Great movie/dvd for my daughter who loves One Direction.  These boys sure do know how to sing and interact with the audience, not only in person, but on the DVD as well.
My girls love anything that has to do with One Direction. It was a hit with them and their friends.
My daughter loved it. It was a big suprise for her party. Her friends thought it was cool and the Party was a great hit.
My daughter loves One D and got this for her Birthday! Gave a real insight to the boys along with all their hits! We loved watching it!
I bought this used and was worried that the DVD would be scratched, but nope! It looks band new! So thanks for the great DVD. Also it arrived 3 days early so that was a plus!
I never had the chance to go to a show on the Up All Night tour.  This DVD is a great glimpse into the concert atmosphere and I really love it.
I bought this. I love one direction. and this movie just brings back all the memories from when I went to the concert.

My Niece loved this!  She's 16 and a 1D mega fan!  She liked that it was real concert footage and behind the scenes.  I watched it too and it was so much better than some of the other "so called" 1D DVD's out on the market.
My sister loves these guys and the videos great price and great content. Very nice for a birthday present .

I bought the Up All Night Live Tour Dvd, Second Hand and it came as if it were brand NEW! and the dvd and dvd case were incredible! and it came in very fast shipping! I will buy from again! and it came with the Tour Card/Vip pass that its supposed to came with so i'm very pleased about that!
This has to be one of the best concert DVDs I have ever seen. If you love 1D like I do then you must have this in your DVD collection. It is cute and fun to watch any day!
I love it, it is great. They are so funny . I love how the talk. If you love One Direction This is a awesome ! I did not get it off of here tho I got it At Target .
Bought this DVD for daughter's birthday. She loves it and watches it almost every day. Next best thing to actually attending one of their concerts.
Her favorite cutie is Niall Horan of One l Direction... It was the perfect gift, because she love's the video!!!
What can I say - did not disappoint the teens in my house.  Not sure it would hold my attention for more than a second or two...
this dvd is a must have for any one direction fan.  i loved it!  i still love one direction and this definately shows off their great performances!
Unfortunately, it was not in stock so didn't arrive.  My granddaughter was greatly disappointed.  However, I'm sure it's a video the kids love.  Maybe I'll reorder.
A gift, this CD made my teen happy to own. Came shipped as expected and there were no problems with the actual cd.
Sent this product to my granddaughter and she seemed extremely happy with the birthday gift, so I'm going to give it a high rating.
She loves it! She was so excited when I gave it to her! It came really fast! I like to order stuff from Amazon because it is so easy and fast!
My girl like it and she love to have it she like one direction so much and all there stuf
Our daughter is crazy about one direction.  This was the perfect surprise for her.  She watches it over and over.

My granddaughter wanted a One Direction CD for her birthday. I saw the Up All Night DVD and thought she might like that better. I was right, and for a day, I was her hero. I can't speak to the music because I haven't listened to it, but she says it is great.

I purchased this DVD for my visiting Grandaughter.  The quality was excellent, just like being at a concert.  She playted this DVD so much until I learned the words.  I ordered it before her visit and received it before the arrived.  This is a true gift to any teenage girl.
I do not know much about this - but it was a gift for my daughter who is very happy with it.
Perfect, ordered a year ago. Good quality, an amazing sound. You can really feel that you're in the show. Excellent product for any directioner
Great gift.  Everyone loved it and plan on getting more as they come out.  Would highly recommend to anyone who is getting this as a gift.

My niece is a One Direction Nutcase and listens to this all the time.
A great Christmas gift for her.

Since the tour was sold out, I wanted to cry thinking I'd never get a chance to see them.  But this dvd is perfect for the fans who didn't get their tickets within the 3 minutes before they sold out.  The quality of the footage is great, there are extras (music video, interview), and it's fun to watch all the crazy fans screaming and crying all over themselves.
It arrived quickly and my daughter loves it.  Very youth friendly and shows the boys sense of humor very well.
How old are your kids? Well this might have been our kids favorite gift this year. They know the thing by heart already.

Unforunately the US tour sold out too fast for me to get my 10 year old daugher tickets.  She was crushed.  As an alternative I came across this DVD and decided to buy it for her as a second choice.  I do not think she has taken it out of her laptop!  She loops it nonstop and said its so much better than the concert because she can watch it anytime and its very "up close and personal".  I would suggest this to any one direction fan!

I rate this item based on how excited and how much my young grand daughter loved the DVD,  Loved it very much, rated it a five based on how my times it has been viewed since receiving. Would recommend it to family and friends who have children that are crazy about 1 Direction. Received it in a very short time (from order date), very impressed.
I loved the dvd! It is great quality and came in great shape! It was very affordable. I watch it almost every day!
My granddaughter is a One Direction fan and bought this for her for Christmas. She watches it over and over and loves it.
I got this for my daughter and she LOVED it! She watches it over and over and over again, well worth the money to make her happy
Our 13 year old is a Directioner and this DVD is played daily!  She knows it by heart!  We even watched it with her and were impressed!!
She raved about it all week, and has watched it repeatedly over that past several weeks. Well worth the asking price I must say old chap!
This is a great dvd concert for One Direction fans of any age. I would recommend this for any fan.

Last year my daughter was crazy about this group. She inisted any more so she let her friend borrow it. Her friend loved it so much she didn't want to give it back so my daughter said she could keep it for a Christmas present. She was thrilled.
Bought this as a gift for my 14 year old niece and she loves it.  She is constantly watching the DVD and cannot get enough of it.

I ordered this for my 14 year old granddaughter for Christmas, and she was so excited to receive it.  She loves One Direction.  All I can say about this product is that she is happy and so I am happy.  Happy with this purchase.
Really great to watch I love 1D soo much so it is a great movie to see. I love these boys to death and here is a good video to prove it :)
I brought it for my niece and we had such fun watching it together.  I enjoyed it as much as see did.  Maybe even more  SHH!! Don't tell anyone.
Really fast service, especially to an APO Address in the United Kingdom. I would recommend this supplier to anyone, thanks
Bought this for my daugther for Christmas, I fully expect it to be worn out by her birthday this summer. Perfect for the tween girl in your life.
worth the price.  my daughter loved it and watched over and over and over again.  she is a 1D fanatic
My 11 year old LOVED this video. It was well worth the money. Your "Directioner" will love this tour video.
i chose this rating because it is a video that my daughter truly loves.  watches it with her friends all the time
It was the next best thing to being at a concert.  My "Directioner" loved it!  It was as if she had front-row seats and backstage passes.
This is the top group on the music group right now. If you have not purchased One Direction you do not know what you are missing. This is for all teens.
My granddaughter had asked for items of One Direction.  She loved this.  I'm sure she will enjoy watching it over and over.
This movie is fantastic! Although it does not deliver the actual "concert" experience, the sound quality is great has many exclusives! This is a must-have for every 1D fan!
This was a xmas gift for my teenage daughter (13).  She was very happy to get it as most of the things i get her are returned so i gave up trying until i saw this movie for purchase.  Thanks
Came within the time it said it would, and it's just really great. I watch it allll the time :)
This video was loved by my granddaughter.  This group is her favorite singing group.  She will share the video with all her friends who love 1D.
this dvd was great my granddaughters loved this. i suprised them with this dvd and they were happy, it came at a perfect timing.
it was a great gift for my fiance little sis, i'd prefer a better packaging but is ok, i recomend it
My daughter got this for Xmas n she loves it - it is on all the time - it is the boys live and also a lot of asking regarding how far they have came

This live One Direction tour DVD is the best, and is an awesome gift for any One Direction fan in the world. This DVD lets 1D fans watch the concert at home without paying the large amount of money for tickets to the live show. I hope your 1D fans enjoy this awesome, jam packed, One Direction Live tour DVD, filled with music, music videos, and interviews with the lads. Enjoy.
My niece loved this!!!  I got it for a Christmas present. She was very excited. Very nice video, great birthday present as well.
I bought this as a gift, and they thoroughly enjoyed it. I, however, not being a big fan, did not really see the appeal of this, but it was a nice gift.
This DVD is of the current day Teeny-Bop, Brain-Rotting 'music' group. I think it stinks but my 9th, and 6th grade girls 'L-O-V-E  I-T" and think the 1D boys are "Utterly Del-Lish".
Appreciate the quick shipment excellent product, my young lady loved this video and anyone who is a fan will enjoy this product
She smiled when she opened it, so it was well worth the purchase.  It came on time and was in good shape.
This was a Christmas present for my granddaughter. When she saw it she had a smile so wide...just what she wanted !!
It arrived promptly, sealed in excellent conditon; brand new! It was purchased for my 13 year old Daughter who loves One Direction!

This is a really good video.  I watched the entire thing with my 12 yr old daughter and did not get bored!  Nice extras as well with the videos and behind the scenes tour moments.  Totally worth the $15.  I know she will watch it again and again!

Who's the best mom in the world. I am. The only problem I had with this video is a section when Harry was in his underwear, boxer breifs. There's also another few sections where their shirts were off that may be inappropriate for young girls.
A gift for my niece.  She was so happy when she opened it.  I must say when we watched it, I also enjoyed it.  Very entertaining.
This movie is so amazing! It makes you feel like you are at the concert yourself. They sing many songs, and do pretty funny stuff! Just don't get if you don't enjoy 1D or their music. Very good!
I have no opinion of this DVD because I ordered as a Christmas present for a little friend of mine.  I only hope she likes it.
My 'One-Directioner' loved this book! Great pictures and little facts that she loves to know and talk to her friends about!
I am beyond happy with this product! It was in great condition and got here really quickly! Great buy if you love One Direction as much as I do!
You will not regret buying this....I am actually pretty old to be a ONE DIRECTION fan but after watching them on XFACTOR UK, I was amazed by their talent and instantly became a fan.

just like in the 80s, that was me with the nkotb shirt @ the nkotb concert screaming my head off!!:)  the 1D concert was very good, it was like you're right there in the arena!! the only critique i have is it was a lil' hard understanding the guys when they're talking in the extras and in between songs...their accents are so thick. (but who cares, i like it!)

if you haven't had a chance to see 1D in concert, i agree with the other fans, this is the next best thing. to all of you seeing them on their tour..you're gonna have a blast!! and you'll never forget the concert!! i still remember the nkotb concert just like it was yesterday.
My dtr is a 1D fan. This is a great video. It is worth the money. It is great for sleepovers.
Second only to the concert ticket she received, my niece loves the dvd.  She has watched it multiple times and can not stop smiling.
For my daughter this was the better gift for birth day and this is an excellent concert into USA and I recommend this for all kids around the world.
verry cool love it so darn much!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! lol 1D lol .louis u are to awsome for your own good!!!!!!!!!hi hi..
This DVD was AMAZAYN, BRILLIAM, EXTRAORDINHARRY, PHENOMENIALL, & FABULOUIS! This is highly recommended by a trustworthy one directioner!!! ;) xx
If you never got to attend one of One Direction's concerts, this is the next best thing! Must have for any Directioner out there!
This dvd was bought for my daughters birthday. She loves anything that has to do with One Direction. She was very excited to get it.

I never got a chance to see them live and I must say that this DVD deffinately did the trick. I have always been a directioner (well since they started) and I am in love with all of them. They all get equal screen time and you even get to see JOSH DEVINE :) I have to admit I screamed while watching it. Haha if you like this watch A Year In The Making. You will love it! Love you directioners :)xxx

This movie absolutely made my Birthday AmaZAYN!  All I can say is that the songs are PhenomiNIALL, the directer did a FabuLOUIS job, the boys are ExtraordinHARRY, of course.  And that the movie is over all BrilLIAM! I would totally buy it again!

I got this dvd for my 12 year old daughter and she thinks it's the Cat's Pyjamas.  (If anyone who is reading this is under 40, 'cat's pyjamas' is a good thing)  I looked at the video with her and saw a lot of cute boys jumping around and singing and looking great in their fashionable duds from a myriad of expensive designers, no doubt.  If that is what you want in a 1D video, then this is what you want to buy.  Moms and dads, it's harmless fun...no swearing, nothing R-rated but of course a bit of the British swagger going on onstage.
my daughter absolutely loved this, no other words to explain. she was counting the days until it came in the mail and it came on time very quickly
Great quality exactly what I wanted! If you love one direction you will love this. Shows the entire tour all the sets the boys look amazing and it's great

I got this product on time and it was securely wrapped and in perfect condition! It has 3 music videos, Gotta Be You, One Thing, and What Makes You Beautiful. It also has a behind the scenes  video which was  very cute and amazayn, of course!(; The picture was clear and it looked like it was a Blu- Ray disc. I'm forever a Directioner and I will cherish this Tour DVD forever!!(:
Bought this to put back for a Christmas gift.  No problems with the package or item.  Pleased with t he product.

This prodcut was for a give, so i cant have a real opinion for this product.

But the delivery arrive on time, so .....was perfect

For the teenagers this CD was wthe perfect give
my daughter was so thrilled with her video... she has been begging for it forever... Thank you for helping make her birthday all that more special...
Was purchased for my grandchildren--don't know they have watched the movie yet? arrived on time. Will tell you more when the movie is watched.
This video has made my daughter very happy. She has viewed several times with and without friends. It is a success for this young teenage female market. I still prefer Eric Clapton!!

My girls all loved this!  Now bear in mind they really like this group...so they appreciated it in a way I may not. They watched it over so many times, it's a good thing I can "appreciate" the music One Direction does.  As a mother I really love that the content is very appropriate for my kids, there are so many others groups that are not. BTW: The girls ages are 8 to 16.
This DVD was amazing, so nice to experience a concert again to help deal with post-concert depression and the behind the scenes were great. have watched this at least 6 times

Nice to have a video of their performances that's professionally made as opposed to fan made.  The fan made ones are OK, but usually the audio is poor and camera holder is screaming so much, you can't hear the guys singing.  It's very, very distractiing.  My main problem with it is that they didn't sing two of my favorite songs off the album.  "Stole My Heart" and "Taken" wasn't sung which is a shame, because those are some of the better tracks.  They should have sung those songs instead of wasting time with that "Valerie" and "I've Got A Feeling" rubbish.  Otherwise I would have given it five stars.  But with those other songs you do get to hear some of them doing solos.  You get a peak back stage which is cool too, and a little behind-the-scenes footage that's enjoyable.  Overall I'm pleased with it and think it's worth the money.

The Up All Night dvd is absolutely amazing!!!  You really get the true concert feeling. I went to one of there concerts before the dvd came out and when i pressed play, it was the exact same as the concert!! I watch this dvd like almost everyday they are amazing and soooooo talented. Its like a mini concert in your own home i absolutely love it!! Every Directioner should have this! This dvd was probably the best thing i ever bought.  Its over 1hr of One Direction how can't you love it!! Definantly buy it!!
I have watched this millions of times and it never gets old! I love One Direction! If you are a directioner then I would definitely recommend this!
I bought this CD for my daughters birthday. She has watched it several times. It is a Fantastic movie & was an excellent choice!
Came super quick, (less than a week) and it was exactly how it was described. very happy! love one direction
Was received in good condition, and product is very good. As this procedos belongs to my niece, i cant confirm exactly about the product, but as per her, it was great, lovely. So thanks

I love one direction and I have literally watched this movie 4 times on the past 2 days. I just keep pressing play again after it is over ... That's how good it is!!!.. And there are behind the scene special features and music videos!!!!!!!!! A definite buy for any DIRECTIONER or anyone that likes good music!

This Blu-Ray features a bonus performance before 'One Thing'.  They sing 'Use Somebody' and it is amazing!  This Blu-Ray has a behind the scenes featurette, and all three music videos.  The quality was great and if you have a Blu-Ray player, and are a Directioner...then I would buy this a.s.a.p.!  *(It does not include a DVD or Digital copy!  Blu-Ray Disc only.)
I really like them. They are really good. I love them. I wish they would let Louis and Niall sing more.

Came wrapped in plastic, perfectly new! I thought it was gonna be kind of like Justin Bieber's Never Say Never where it's a concert and his story but it was just the concert so i was a little disapointed... But I love One Direction! It also has a short behind the scenes video and their music videos for WMYB, OT, and GBY.
I got this for my daughter for her birthday and she has watched it several times a day EVERY DAY!!!!  She absolutely loves it!

This is the best movie I have seen in a long time. The boys did amazing. We saw stuff you wouldn't expect to see. I love this movie. I am proud to be a Directioner. I am proud of my boys and how far they've come since X Factor.
I bought this DVD for my daughters. They went wild! Watched over and over, singing all the songs. It was nice to see a band that focused on the music not all the hipe! Move over Justin Bieber.....!

This concert dvd rocks (no pun intended). for any one directioners out there, i highly recommend this product.  The dvd included extras, the full concert performance throughout the seasons (with of course a few surprises),music videos, and 5 of the most talented, good-looking,beautifully vocal, funny, and overall amazing british boys.  Anyyyywayyy, you should definetly add this to your wish list or even amazon cart if you're a 1D fan.  My friend (who also has this dvd) said that it's almost exactly like being at of their concerts except without annoying people next to you, the long drive there, and the expensive ticket price. :)
My 15 yr old daughter wanted to go to a concert, but we didn't have enough money. Now we can have a little concert of our own in living room

I ordered this for a friend (she is a big One Direction fan) we watched it together. it was a great DVD, not a lot of money, VERY quick and good shipping, and it came in great condition. I recommend this as a present for any One Direction fan! :)

Bought this item on a whim and just received it today and I LOVE it! The boys are adorable, the music is infectious (as long as you love boy band music) and the bonus 3 music video's are worth the DVD. The hype is there for a reason, these lads really do deliver and they do all that they can to make their fans happy.

I look forward to their next DVD and their follow up CD to Up All Night.

Words cannot explain how exciting this is!!!! This dvd will give me goosebumps:)!! One Direction is amazing and wonderful! They sing awesome live and they love to preform in front of people. Also, they are so funny and fun! Loving the dvd!:)

By the looks of it, this release already has one flaw....where is Stole My Heart (their best song , in my opinion...)?? this is a huge disappointment for me but i guess i will still buy it because these guys have actual vocal talent (unlike many artists today).
I just saw them live on the opening night of their US tour so I can't wait to get this in the mail and experience it all over again!!

This is going to be great! I ordered 4 copies of this dvd so I can do a worldwide giveaway! 3 dvds for the winners and 1 for myself of course! Throwing an Up All Night house party with the screening of the movie/concert! Excited.

I am soooooooooooooooo excited about this DVD! I celebrated by literaly memorizing the album. I'm gonna buy 10 to sell to all the middle school heartthrobs at my school. They will pay ANYTHING to buy one.

AHHHHHHH! Just ordered it and I know it's going to be epic. Can't wait to watch it! OMG they are so awesome live, its unreal. The only complaint is that they put Harry in the center like that. yes, harry is the most popular member, but there is NO LEAD SINGER in the band. They should all be equals. And Harry is my fave member, but I love them all! I'm so excited.

I was able to review this during a Pre-Screening [...]& the girls that were able to watch it with me went wild! This is a great DVD & it's refreshing to see a band that focuses on singing their music rather than focusing on trying to do the latest dance moves. This DVD is a must have for any 1D fans - you won't be disappointed. It definitely got us hyped for the concert that we're going to next month! Loved it! :)
They're all so flawless omg best movie ever. PHENOMINAL, EXTRAORDIHARRY, FABULOUIS, AMAZAYN, BRILIAM OMG JUST SO GOOD. PREORDER THIS DVD RIGHT NOW IT WILL MAKE YOUR LIFE BETTER I PROMISE JUST GET IT

A concert performed by five amazing members of the band is finally going to be released in DVD. You know I will be getting this exactly the day it hits the DVD shelves. I can not wait. These guys are phenomenal.
One direction are awesome i own there up all night album i love it this is even more ecitieing i never been to there concerts i will be

Concert: 5.0/5.0
The concert is great, they are excellent singers and entertainers. The concert is very entertaining, they have a short video segments between set changes and whatnot, if you a fan of One Direction this is a must have and they are excellent live singers. The thing I find most disappointing is that the concert is very short, the concert is about an hour and ten minutes long, I think it should be a bit longer maybe an hour and half with a few extra songs for the encore instead of the one, but anyways, it's a great concert and I can't wait to go see them perform live, if it's as amazing as it on the concert DVD.

**DVD REVIEW**
This is a review on the DVD's video quality and audio quality.
VIDEO: 3.0/5.0
I honestly think the Video quality isn't great, I think it looks a bit fuzzy and it's not as good as it should be, but anyways, it's still very watchable.
AUDIO: 4.0/5.0
The DVD includes both 2.0 Stereo and 5.1 Surround, the 2.0 stereo sounds a bit funny in my opinion, but it's still clear. I prefer the 5.1 surround, it sounds excellent and is well balanced and the surround is excellent.

DVD Overall Rating: 4.0/5.0
